channel.title: Look please, easy question! please please please look!
channel.description: for a 508+, where would it be coded for the gold crown by your name to appear when you talk if you are admin or owner? where is it programmed to tell the server that i am owner therefore add crown?? PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME!! LOL ;D ;D

no no, i guess i didn’t explain well enough, lol. I am the owner, and i have the crown by my name and all, but i want there to be 2 crowns by my name, not just the one…u get what i’m sayin? sry, i’m bad at explaining…

item.title: Look please, easy question! please please please look!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Its different for every packed server. Check for a Login.java or RS2LoginProtocol.java. Than search for a line that says
p.rights = 2;
Look above it and replace that name with yours.

If that doesn’t work, open your character file in wordpad and change the rights to 2.

Read full topic
